Data Sets

I created a script to scrape historic data from CoinGecko for use in the backtester, allowing users a wide selection of price histories to backtest their strategies against.

I also built a generator to get random new chart shapes to try out (though it’s not very sophisticated).

[IMAGE: chart generator]

Tick Cycle

To

One of the key goals I had in mind while designing the runner was to allow the user to write a minimum amount of code in their strategies. Here’s what I did to archieve this:

  • Created a cycle of: processLastTick > calculateCurrentTick > processCurrentTick to handle any common work
  • Created a dynamic form, built from the form field schema and default values given by the strategy
